languages.text: Физический {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} обычно наносится снарядами дальнобойных орудий и рукопашным оружием. Типы физического урона: -{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Ударный{/g}: все, что может нанести удар тупым предметом, например тупое оружие, удары без оружия, болты и взрывы. -{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}Раздирающий{/g}: все, что имеет острый край, например холодное оружие, и острые снаряды, например сюрикены. -{g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}Пронзающий{/g}: любые проникающие снаряды, такие как пули или игольчатые боеприпасы. -{g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}Силовой{/g}: любое силовое оружие.

Physical {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is usually dealt by projectiles or {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons. Its types are:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Impact{/g}: anything capable of inflicting blunt force {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g} like blunt weapons, unarmed strikes, bolts, and explosions.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}Rending{/g}: anything with a sharp edge like bladed weapons and sharp projectiles like shurikens.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}Piercing{/g}: any piercing projectiles like bullets or needle ammunition.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}Power{/g}: any power weapons.</indent>
languages.original_text: Физический {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} обычно наносится снарядами дальнобойных орудий и рукопашным оружием. Типы физического урона: -{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Ударный{/g}: все, что может нанести удар тупым предметом, например тупое оружие, удары без оружия, болты и взрывы. -{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}Раздирающий{/g}: все, что имеет острый край, например холодное оружие, и острые снаряды, например сюрикены. -{g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}Пронзающий{/g}: любые проникающие снаряды, такие как пули или игольчатые боеприпасы. -{g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}Силовой{/g}: любое силовое оружие.

-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Impact{/g}: anything capable of inflicting blunt force {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g} like blunt weapons, unarmed strikes, bolts, and explosions.</indent>

languages.text:
Physischer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} wird normalerweise durch Geschosse oder {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfwaffen{/g} verursacht. Es gibt folgende Arten:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Schlagschaden{/g}: alles, was {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}stumpfe Gewalteinwirkung{/g} verursachen kann, wie stumpfe Waffen, unbewaffnete Schläge, Bolzen und Explosionen.</indent>
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}Rüstungsbrechend{/g}: alles, was eine scharfe Schneide hat, wie Klingenwaffen und scharfe Geschosse wie Shuriken.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}Durchdringend{/g}: alle durchschlagenden Geschosse wie Kugeln oder Nadelmunition.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}Kraft{/g}: Alle Kraftwaffen.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Physical {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is usually dealt by projectiles or {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons. Its types are:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Impact{/g}: anything capable of inflicting blunt force {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g} like blunt weapons, unarmed strikes, bolts, and explosions.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}Rending{/g}: anything with a sharp edge like bladed weapons and sharp projectiles like shurikens.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}Piercing{/g}: any piercing projectiles like bullets or needle ammunition.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}Power{/g}: any power weapons.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Physischer Schaden wird normalerweise durch Projektile oder Nahkampfwaffen verursacht. Es gibt folgende Arten:
-<indent=5%>Aufprall: Alles, was {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}stumpfe Gewalteinwirkung{/g} bewirkt, wie stumpfe Waffen, Faustschläge, Bolts und Explosionen</indent>
<indent=5%>Rüstungsbrechend: Alles, was eine scharfe Klinge hat, z. B. Klingenwaffen und scharfe Geschosse wie Shuriken</indent>
-<indent=5%>Durchdringend: Alle durchdringenden Geschosse wie Kugeln oder Nadelmunition</indent>
-<indent=5%>Energie: Alle Energiewaffen</indent>

languages.text:
Les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} physiques sont généralement infligés par des projectiles ou des armes de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g}. Il en existe différents types :
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Dégâts d'impact{/g} : tout ce qui peut infliger un {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumatisme{/g}, comme les armes contondantes, les coups portés sans arme ou les explosions.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}Dégâts de lacération{/g} : tout ce qui est tranchant, comme les armes blanches et les projectiles tranchants comme les shurikens.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}Dégâts perforants{/g} : tout projectile perçant, comme les balles ou les munitions à aiguille.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}Dégâts d'énergie{/g} : toute arme énergétique.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Physical {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is usually dealt by projectiles or {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons. Its types are:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Impact{/g}: anything capable of inflicting blunt force {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g} like blunt weapons, unarmed strikes, bolts, and explosions.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}Rending{/g}: anything with a sharp edge like bladed weapons and sharp projectiles like shurikens.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}Piercing{/g}: any piercing projectiles like bullets or needle ammunition.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}Power{/g}: any power weapons.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Les dégâts physiques sont généralement infligés par des projectiles ou des armes de mêlée. Leurs différents types sont les suivants :
- <indent=5%>Dégâts par impact : tout ce qui peut infliger un {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumatisme{/g} contondant, comme les armes contondantes, les coups portés sans arme, les bolts et les explosions</indent>
- <indent=5%>Dégâts perforants : tout ce qui est tranchant, comme les armes blanches et les projectiles tranchants tels que les shurikens</indent>
- <indent=5%>Dégâts perçants : tout projectile perçant, comme les balles ou les munitions à aiguille</indent>
- <indent=5%>Dégâts énergétiques : toute arme énergétique</indent>

languages.text:
物理{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}通常由射弹或{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}武器造成。物理伤害类型包括：
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}冲击{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}{/g}钝器打击造成的创伤，如钝器、徒手打击、爆矢、爆炸等。</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}撕裂{/g}：带有锋利边缘的武器造成的伤害，包括带有利刃的武器与锋利的投射物，如星镖。</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}穿刺{/g}：穿刺武器造成的伤害，如子弹或针状弹药等。</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}高能{/g}：所有能量武器造成的伤害。</indent>
languages.original_text:
Physical {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is usually dealt by projectiles or {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons. Its types are:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Impact{/g}: anything capable of inflicting blunt force {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g} like blunt weapons, unarmed strikes, bolts, and explosions.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}Rending{/g}: anything with a sharp edge like bladed weapons and sharp projectiles like shurikens.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}Piercing{/g}: any piercing projectiles like bullets or needle ammunition.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}Power{/g}: any power weapons.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
物理伤害通常由射弹或近战武器造成。物理伤害类型包括：
- <indent=5%>冲击：钝器打击造成的创伤，如钝器、徒手打击、爆矢、爆炸等。{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}{/g}</indent>
- <indent=5%>撕裂：带有锋利边缘的武器造成的伤害，包括带有利刃的武器与锋利的投射物，如星镖。</indent>
- <indent=5%>穿刺：穿刺武器造成的伤害，如子弹或针状弹药等。</indent>
- <indent=5%>高能：所有能量武器造成的伤害。</indent>

languages.original_text: Physical damage is usually dealt by projectiles or melee weapons. Its types are: -{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Impact{/g}: anything capable of inflicting blunt force trauma like blunt weapons, unarmed strikes, bolts, and explosions. -{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}Rending{/g}: anything with a sharp edge like bladed weapons and sharp projectiles like shurikens. -{g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}Piercing{/g}: any piercing projectiles like bullets or needle ammo. -{g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}Power{/g}: any Power Weapons.

languages.text:
El {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} físico suele proceder de proyectiles y armas {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}. Tiene los siguientes tipos:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Impacto{/g}: todo lo que pueda infligir traumatismos, como las armas contundentes, los golpes sin armas, los bólters y las explosiones.</indent>{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}{/g}
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}Acerado{/g}: todo el causado por un filo, como armas de hoja y proyectiles cortantes como los shuriken.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}Perforante{/g}: todo proyectil perforante, como las balas o la munición de agujas.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}Energía{/g}: el infligido por cualquier arma de energía.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Physical {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is usually dealt by projectiles or {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons. Its types are:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Impact{/g}: anything capable of inflicting blunt force {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g} like blunt weapons, unarmed strikes, bolts, and explosions.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}Rending{/g}: anything with a sharp edge like bladed weapons and sharp projectiles like shurikens.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}Piercing{/g}: any piercing projectiles like bullets or needle ammunition.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}Power{/g}: any power weapons.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
El daño físico suele proceder de proyectiles y armas cuerpo a cuerpo. Tiene los siguientes tipos:
-<indent=5%>Impacto: todo lo que pueda infligir traumatismos, como las armas contundentes, los golpes sin armas, los bólters y las explosiones.</indent>{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}{/g}
-<indent=5%>Acerado: todo el causado por un filo, como armas de hoja y proyectiles cortantes como los shuriken.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Perforante: todo proyectil perforante, como las balas o la munición de agujas.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Energía: el infligido por cualquier arma de energía.</indent>

languages.text:
身体的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}は通常、投擲物や{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}武器によって与えられる。その種類は：
－<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}衝撃{/g}：鈍器、非武装攻撃、ボルト、および爆発など{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}鈍的外傷{/g}を加える事ができるもの。</indent>
－<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}裂傷{/g}：刃物のような鋭利な刃を持つ武器や手裏剣のような鋭い発射物。</indent>
－<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}ピアシング{/g}：弾丸や針弾のような突き刺すような発射物</indent>
－<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}パワー{/g}：あらゆるパワーウェポン。</indent>
languages.original_text:
Physical {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is usually dealt by projectiles or {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons. Its types are:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Impact{/g}: anything capable of inflicting blunt force {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g} like blunt weapons, unarmed strikes, bolts, and explosions.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}Rending{/g}: anything with a sharp edge like bladed weapons and sharp projectiles like shurikens.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}Piercing{/g}: any piercing projectiles like bullets or needle ammunition.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}Power{/g}: any power weapons.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
身体的ダメージは通常、発射物や近接武器によって与えられる。その種類は：
－<indent=5%>衝撃：鈍器、非武装攻撃、ボルト、および爆発など鈍的{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}外傷{/g}を与えるもの。</indent>
－<indent=5%>裂傷：刀剣などの鋭い刃を持つ武器や手裏剣のような鋭い発射物</indent>
－<indent=5%>貫通：弾丸や針弾のような貫通性のある発射物</indent>
－<indent=5%>パワー：あらゆるパワーウェポン</indent>

languages.text:
Fiziksel {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} genellikle mermiler veya {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} silahları tarafından verilir. Türleri şunlardır:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Darbe{/g}: Küt silah, silahsız saldırı, bulon ve patlamalar gibi küt cisim {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}travması{/g} oluşturabilen her şeyin verdiği hasar.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}Yırtma{/g}: Bıçaklı silah, şuriken gibi keskin uçlu her türlü cismin verdiği hasar.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}Delme{/g}: Mermi veya iğne cephanesi gibi delici her türlü cismin verdiği hasar.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}Güç{/g}: Her türlü güç silahının verdiği hasar.</indent>

Physical {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is usually dealt by projectiles or {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons. Its types are:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Impact{/g}: anything capable of inflicting blunt force {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g} like blunt weapons, unarmed strikes, bolts, and explosions.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}Rending{/g}: anything with a sharp edge like bladed weapons and sharp projectiles like shurikens.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}Piercing{/g}: any piercing projectiles like bullets or needle ammunition.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}Power{/g}: any power weapons.</indent>
